monitor_migration_util.py.description:
[ MONITOR MIGRATION UTIL ]

	1. Run the utility in 'export' mode to generate MaC configuration.
	2. Modify the 'monitors.yml' generated in step 1 to incorporate monitor changes.
	3. Run the utility in 'migrate' mode (monitors will not be commited).
	   • Set -f flag to create the monitors.
	4. Once confirmed migrated monitors are working as expected, you may disable the original monitors by running the utility in 'disable' mode.
	   • Alternatively, you can delete the original monitors by running the utility in 'cleanup' mode.
